skills.name: Power Surge
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, dealing damage and transferring a weakening effect on you to the enemy.

skill_effect.name: Transfer Debuff
skill_effect.description: Removes a debuff from casting monster and applies it to the target monster.

skills.name: Spear of Devastation
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times with each attack, removing 1 beneficial effect and sets back the target's skills to MAX cooldown.

skill_effect.name: Increase Cooltime
skill_effect.description: Puts the target's skill on cool down.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.name: King of the Ruins(Passive)
skills.description: Attacks deal 50% increased damage on enemies are under harmful effects. Also, attacks will deal 50% increased damage on enemies that do not have any beneficial effects. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.
